column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////So before going
column2: I heard that the tonkotsu black was salty and if you didn't eat a lot of salty
column3: then don't order it. So I ordered the tonkotsu white. At first
column5: wow this is really bland... But if you ate it with the pork
column6: the pork is super flavorful and will give you all the flavor. They offer fresh garlic
column7: and that makes a HUGE difference!
